title: International placements
content: Hey seniors how many ppl usually get an international offer during on campus placements?

comments.body: I don't remember hearing any on campus. I know 2-3 people at least got it off campus.
There aren't any on-campus international placements. Tbh, I'm not sure if there have been any international placements in the last 2-3 years.
Two of my friends got international placements off campus, how much PESU helped in that I don't know.
Still remember how PESU milked off that off campus 1.6cr package.
Off campus = PESU did not help
Ya I know lol,  I meant how much PESU's "reputation" or alumni n stuff might help.
